title: Volcano on Bead Mountain
text: Elaine Small creates intricate, miniature sculpture using traditional basket making techniques of coiling and knotting. Although many of her works contain specific narrative and conceptual elements, some, such as <I>Volcano on Bead Mountain<I>, are given a suggestive title that allows viewers an opportunity to engage their imaginations.
description: small, pyramid-shaped structure with indentation near top; woven bands and round and tube-shaped beads in purples, greens and yellows overall
